message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know if you're interested!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $850,000 for your product. I believe this is a fair compromise given its value to me. Looking forward to your response!

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $850,000 is still too low for me. I'm willing to go down to $900,000,  which is a fair compromise considering the value of the product to you. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. I would like to propose a price of $875,000 for your product. I believe this is a reasonable compromise, considering its value to me. I hope this aligns better with what you're willing to accept.
